Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Expands the right to seek the appointment of administrators of buildings to tenants and local governments throughout to make procedures conform with realities of housing stock; repealer
Summary: Expands the right to seek the appointment of administrators of buildings to tenants and local governments throughout the state and to make procedures conform with realities of housing stock throughout the state; repeals certain provisions of the real property actions and proceedings law relating thereto.
LawSection: Real Property Actions and Proceedings Law
LawCode: Rpld §§777 & 796-i, amd RPAP L, generally; amd §110, NYC Civ Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property actions and proceedings law and the New York city civil court act, in relation to expanding the right to seek the appointment of administrators of buildings to tenants and local governments throughout the state and to repeal sections 777 and 796-i of the real property actions and proceedings law relating thereto
